ygData.subject: Re: Welcome
ygData.msgSnippet: I use this one at work as well...I am also subscribed from my home. I believe there were some people discussing the Shining star of light Quest over the past
ygData.messageBody:
I use this one at work as well...I am also subscribed from my home.
I believe there were some people discussing the Shining star of light Quest
over the past few days, seems as though that topic is about done. We were
also discussing the fact of the various typos Verant has on items in the
game I.E. Ethereal Mist greaves not stating that DE and Halflings can wear
them. I think that was pretty much it (correct me guys if I am wrong). Feel
free to start a new discussion if you would like, I'm sure someone will be
posting something soon.

Bree
